Title: Yumehito: Yumejin
Description: ["A university student dreams of becoming a ballet dancer. She feels like she can't ever achieve it but goes through a period of self-reflection of what makes her happy."]
Related: ['Prequel: Zhiqu Yang Xuetang: Diqiu Jianianhua', 'Sequel: Zhiqu Yang Xuetang: Qihuan Chengyu Shu']
